main event: A UFO sighting was reported in New Mexico in November 1958, where an individual observed a flaming, fiery, disc-like object traveling at terrific speed, faster than a jet, and trailing off into space.
interesting points: The sighting occurred on Thanksgiving Day in 1958 in New Mexico from a Greyhound bus.
The object was described as disc-like and appeared to be traveling at an extremely fast rate of speed, faster than a jet, before trailing off into space.
The witness expressed frustration at not receiving attention or belief in their account of the sighting.
A request for additional information was made in 1962, but investigation was deemed not possible.
The witness expressed doubt in discussing the sighting, feeling that others wouldn't believe them and finding it difficult to describe the object perfectly.
sighted object: flaming, fiery, disc-like object traveling at terrific speed
